name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Epi Easy Dev Hide License Warning

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the Episerver invalid license warning message on all sites visited by this browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hides the Episerver invalid license warning message on all sites visited by this browser. 

This extension is intended only for use during development, make sure to visit https://license.episerver.com for official demo and partner licenses.
